name: Mark Elliot Zuckerberg
achievements: Co-founded Facebook in 2004
Became the world's youngest self-made billionaire in 2008
Net worth of $214.1 billion as of March 2025
Second richest person globally
legacy: Revolutionized social media and digital communication.

name: Elon Musk
known_for: Founder of Neuralink and The Boring Company
achievements: Founded SpaceX in 2002 and Tesla in 2004
Revolutionized reusable rockets and electric vehicles
Founded OpenAI in 2015, co-founded Neuralink in 2016, and launched The Boring Company in 2017
Acquired Twitter and rebranded it as X in 2023
Net worth of $330 billion as of March 2025
Named Time's Person of the Year in 2021
legacy: Pioneer in electric vehicles, space exploration, and renewable energy.

name: Beyoncé
achievements: Rose to fame as a member of Destiny's Child, one of the best-selling girl groups of all time
Debut solo album 'Dangerously in Love' (2003) became one of the best-selling albums of the 21st century
Hit singles include 'Crazy in Love', 'Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It)', 'Halo', and 'Break My Soul'
Starred in films like 'Dreamgirls', 'Cadillac Records', and 'The Lion King'
Created acclaimed concept albums like 'Beyoncé' (2013) and 'Lemonade' (2016)
First woman to headline an all-stadium tour
Most awarded artist in Grammy Awards history
Inducted into the Guinness World Records Hall of Fame and the Black Music & Entertainment Walk of Fame
Named the Greatest Pop Star of the 21st Century by Billboard
Listed as one of the greatest singers ever by Rolling Stone
philanthropy: Supports various charitable causes through the BeyGOOD initiative
Advocates for social justice, education, and disaster relief
legacy: One of the most influential and celebrated artists in music history, known for her groundbreaking work and cultural impact.

name: Jeffrey Preston Bezos
achievements: Founded Amazon in 1994, which became the world's largest e-commerce and cloud computing company
Founded Blue Origin in 2000, a private aerospace manufacturer and sub-orbital spaceflight company
Purchased The Washington Post in 2013 for $250 million
Co-founded Altos Labs in 2021
legacy: Revolutionized e-commerce, cloud computing, and space exploration.
